import React from 'react' import {FcDeleteDatabase} from 'react-icons/fc' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' function CartItem({item,itemIndex}) { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const removeFromCart = ()=>{ dispatch(remove(item.id)) } return (

{item.title}

{item.description}

{item.price}

) } export default CartItem
